channel.title: Health
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Health, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Your Body Needs Vitamin B12
item.description: Vitamin B12 powers your nerves, blood cells, and energy. Learn why it matters, how to get enough, and what happens when levels run low.

item.description: Many parents are stuck in a constant self-improvement cycle—and may be losing sight of who they are and what they authentically know.

item.title: Republicans push high deductible plans and health savings accounts
item.description: A Republican call to give Americans cash instead of health insurance subsidies revives an old idea that has left millions with medical debt.
